channel.title: Delta Stability Fix [How to ?]
channel.description:
Can someone tell me what I should remove or add to improve the stability of my delta server ? I know you gotta delete things in process in client class but what ?
And what do I need to erase too ?
Thanks.

item.title: Delta Stability Fix [How to ?]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

Ok thanks.
Is there any ither things to do to make it better again ?

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Stability Fix [How to ?]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“I Hope I, post:7, topic:383573”][quote author=deathschaos9 link=topic=479345.msg3509443#msg3509443 date=1298426839]
As previously stated, the number of custom items wont effect the stability of the server.
[/quote]

That’s what I thought.
So yeah, the thread per client is in playerHandler class right ?

And also, if I were to remove things in process and they only go in process like special attacks, where would I move them ?[/quote]
For thread per client, google some tutorials or look on POON-SERB3R.

Also, almost everything aside from timers can be handled outside of the process method but a few people are too lazy to do it
Use Graham’s EventManager as an alternative for the process method.

EDIT: But if you want to remove Thread per client, it’s in the server class, not PlayerHandler.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Stability Fix [How to ?]
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“I Hope I, post:4, topic:383573”]Thread per client is in playerHandler right?
And why should I remove custom items ? I have none unless dragon platebody. This is client sided, no need for that.[/quote]
Having 1 dragon platebody is fine, but most delta clients have hundreds. If you want to improve the stability of a delta, have no customs, or at least very little.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Stability Fix [How to ?]
item.dc:creator: @I_Hope_I I Hope I
item.description:
@I_Hope_I wrote:

Thread per client is in playerHandler right?
And why should I remove custom items ? I have none unless dragon platebody. This is client sided, no need for that.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Stability Fix [How to ?]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

Start by removing all that bull shit out of the process method, the only thing that should be in there is timers. Then remove thread per client.

But still after this there is more.
I suggest saving the trouble and using Hyperion.

Travas:

You can start by removing ALL custom items from the client.

Lol, all that will do is make your client start up faster, but good suggestion though.

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Stability Fix [How to ?]
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

You can start by removing ALL custom items from the client.
